name: Accounts-Linux
short_description:
Full accounts system, including web access for order processing and home workers.

Systems can be tailored to suite each individual need, and works in multiple currencies.

Reports can be self customized.

Less keystrokes per entry

Invoices and orders processed automatically, reducing the need for manual input.

Automatic payment runs

Automatic bank reconcilliation
summary: Accounts system, incorporating stock and web processing
